Derek Storkel '14 Distance/XC

Minnesota made me the man I am today.

  • Full Testimonial
  • Back To Alumni

By going to Minnesota, it led me down a life path that led me to where I am now. The friends, the memories, and most importantly my wife. Without my wife, I wouldn't be where I'm at now. Minnesota gave me this life in more ways than one, and for that I'm deeply grateful.
